name: Astro Volleyball
description: Astro Volleyball is simple game for iPhone/iPod touch. Let's play volleyball, and destroy astro robots!!!

name: Dodo Fly: New World
description: A cute and happy dolphin toy – this is Dodo. Dodo is chasing real ocean and trying to become real dolphin. And it’s trying to jump and fly to escape the toy world. Watch out for the enemy toy and try to reach the destination. Sky is waiting for you, just fly!!!

name: Car Racing: High on Fuel
description:
The Ultimate Fast paced Intense Arcade Racing game set in streets of Trip Island with 60 Unique Tracks specifically designed for a high Adrenaline rush is finally here!
Race with 10 High Speed Cars, take them from Stock to Street Monsters.

name: Tesla Boy: Robot Time Traveller
description:
Reach new dimensions as you play as Tesla Boy, a time traveling robot who must find his creator. Reach blazing speeds while on the ground or catch a jetpack and soar to the skies as you turbo boost through space to find hidden treasures.
Play against friends on this futurist adventure. A complete platformer with incredible landscapes to explore and stacks of explosive power ups that can boost you into a whole new dimension of fun!
Simple, yet addictive one button game play controls to bounce or fly over mysterious monsters and challenging traps. Collect new treasures that help you race through time to find your almighty creator.

name: Night Racer: Street Racing 3D
description:
Compete in 3 different game modes, championship mode, Arcade Mode and Time Trial. The game features over 8 different cars to choose from. Ranging from sports cars all the way buses. A unique Futuristic Artstyle has been created to immerse you into the game world.
The opponent AI in the game is a marquee feature as well. It learns the way you drive and keeps getting better, making the game challenging as you keep playing. Right now the game features 5 unique tracks, each have their own sets of obstacles and challenges for you to overcome. While you're racing watch out for the opponents who like to go rogue and push you off the edges of the track.

name: Undead Zone
description: Survive through as many nights as possible with a card system that you place on the field. You can place defenses and buildings such as farms to feed the last citizens who are fighting for the collective defense.

name: Super Robot Taisen Alpha for Dreamcast
description: Super Robot Taisen Alpha for Dreamcast is a strategy simlulation game for Dreamcast, released on 2001. The game is an extended port of Super Robot Taisen Alpha with changes in the system, including an overall 3D transition, more titles in the game, and the ability to use coalescing attacks.

name: Paint By Numbers
description: Sin descripción

name: Orange
description: Can you make the screen orange in 50 levels? Each level has its own logic. It's here, the next part of my colour puzzle series!

name: Angry Neighbor: The Strange House
description:
You should reveal neighbor's secrets... but it will not be so easy because, he knows that he entered his house.

Go into the neighbor's house and find neighbor's secrets but try not to be seen.

name: Hunt: Showdown - Bridgewater's Honor
description:
This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter and three Legendary Weapons:

- Sgt. Bridgewater (one hunter)
- Honor Above (one weapon)
- Standard Issue (one weapon)
- Arlington Grave (one weapon)

name: Wolcen: Lords of Mayhem - Deluxe Edition
description: A bold and beautiful hack n' slash ARPG with no class restrictions and satisfying brutal combat. Forge a bloody path through a dark fantasy world in an epic story campaign, paving the way to a truly dynamic endgame, master your skills, and become The Ascended.

name: Fazbear's Shootout
description: "Welcome to your first day at Fazbear Entertainment trying an arcade machine and doing absolutely nothing but playing on it. Fazbear Entertainment assures you that all the coins/credits you've spent on the arcade will be spent wisely, and not given away to corporate entities to please the investors."

name: Angry Neighbor: The Temporary Neighbor
description:
You moved into a new house for a while and you see new person settling in the neighborhood. It seemed strange from day one, and now you've decided to break into his house and solve its mysteries.

Go into the neighbor's house and find neighbor's secrets but try not to be seen. Otherwise it will get worse.

name: Juurru
description: Travel through the roots of ancient flora. 24 tiny caves to solve and many many roots to grow!

name: Baldo: The Elemental Temples
description: Baldo's free update, The Elemental Temples includes enemies you'll encounter and more, featuring four new dungeons and more. The update is a new standalone adventure for lovers of complex dungeons, and the story follows the events after the Three Fairies DLC and before the Guardian Owls.

name: The Lord of Lightning
description: Sin descripción

name: The Last Wish
description: See the world from the prospective of different animals and learn what they have in their life to teach you.

name: Tickling Girls
description: This is a casual puzzle class game. The story takes place between a pair of sexy and beautiful sisters. Sisters often play jigsaw puzzles together, and as punishment, the one who completes the puzzle gets to tickle the other.

name: The Most Lecherous
description: The first erotic game for young people, why pay when you can play for free?

name: The Last of The Core
description: The Last Of The Core is a third person survival horror shooter for one player where you are a soldier member of the "Two Six" team. You must recover samples in an area where there was an incident at the research facility and dinosaurs are on the loose everywhere.

name: Story of the Olivia
description: Welcome to the Wild West.Meet Olivia Carter.Fulfill missions.Earn money and uphold the law against thugs.

name: Heartbite: Dating by Daylight
description: Get to know a unique cast of characters in Heartbite: Dating in Daylight! Escape from a dire situation, collect candy and witness a decisive battle as you get closer to them. Behold stunning locations, uncover secrets and get a taste of different genre minigames in this dating sim!

name: Enter the Cyberjungle
description: Enter the Cyberjungle is a single-player, deckbuilding card game inspired by the rules of ----. Face a desperate struggle of skill and luck as you attempt to turn your pile of worthless digital cardboard heroes into a team that can defy the card game gods and win the Cyberjungle tournament.

name: Dirty Room
description: First person shooter horror adventure game. As detective C, you arrived at an old friend's home and try to find out what's going on.

name: Dawn of Mages
description:
Dawn of Mages is a new PvP Battle Arena that lays down the classical guns and the sword&board in favor of reality shaping spells.

Start a match and fight against other players (or AI) and show your skills in this fast-paced magical 3rd person shooter.

Skills and reaction time combined with strategy and fast-thinking in a fascinating and spectacular setting.

name: Retro Golden Age: Goody
description: Goody, the original spectrum action, platform and puzzle game from the eighties, puts you in the shoes of an expert bank robber in an updated version for Steam with improvements such as saving, filters and screen settings and achievements with the best Spanish hits.

name: Hungry Monster
description: You have reincarnated as a hungry monster, who is eating candies. Avoid the bombs and collect the time to live longer.

name: Quiz Thiz Italy: Silver Edition
description: Are you the new quiz master and can you beat your friends on this quiz? Answer questions about this country and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about this country while playing!

name: Sea of Thieves: Deluxe Edition
description: Celebrate five years of Sea of Thieves with this special edition, which includes a copy of the game with all permanent content added since launch, plus a wide-ranging assortment of extra cosmetics and collector’s items. In addition to the 2023 Edition bonus content – Hunter Cutlass, Hunter Pistol, Hunter Compass, Hunter Hat, Hunter Jacket, Hunter Sails and 10,000 gold – this edition of the game comes with a further Deluxe Bundle containing the Black Phoenix Figurehead, Black Phoenix Sails, Crab Dab Emote, Deck Hide Emote and 550 Ancient Coins for use in the Pirate Emporium.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask Randomizer
description: Majora's Mask Randomizer is an application that randomizes item locations, music, and more for Majora's Mask, presenting millions of combinations and new ways to replay the game.

name: Penny Larceny: Gig Economy Supervillain
description: Join Penny in planning and executing daring heists across the city, and navigate the intricate web of alliances and betrayals that makes up the criminal underworld. With snappy comic book artwork, a swinging soundtrack of electro-jazz and a multiverse-spanning storyline of victories and disasters, Penny Larceny is a must-play for visual novel fans. Are you ready to embark on the heist of a lifetime?

name: Zelda II: The Adventure of Link Randomizer
description: A ROM Randomizer for the NES classic Zelda II: The Adventure of Link.

name: Streets of Rage 4
description: Streets of Rage 4 is an unreleased game developed as a sequel to Streets of Rage 3. There have been at least two attempts at creating Streets of Rage 4, the first eventually seeing release in the re-branded form of Fighting Force, however a more "pure" attempt at a sequel, developed in-house by Sega was due for release on the Sega Dreamcast at one stage.

name: Tap Track Heroes
description:
Super fun & stylish - Tap Track Heroes is a track & field game designed to give your fingers a real work out!
Compete in 4 events to beat the world records on the Game Centre leaderboards.
Easy to play but difficult to master - we have gone to great lengths to ensure the way the game plays will separate the best from the rest!

name: Rival Stars College Football
description: As the head coach of a college football program, you make the calls. Recruit fresh talent, build an unbeatable playbook, and make risky plays for big payoffs. Join forces with players from around the world to form alliances and take on rivals. With big dreams and even bigger challenges, the team will rely on your leadership to take them to the top. Will they make it to the Hall of Legends?

name: Pudding Chess
description: Pudding Chess is the cute apple chess game in Pudding Series.

name: Perfect Swing
description: Compete in real-time multiplayer games against golfers from all around the world in Match play.

name: Pill Puzzle
description:
Fight with friends and rivals in global, cross-platform, real-time puzzle.
Pill Puzzle is an addictive puzzle game. This area is populated by viruses of three colors: red, yellow, and blue, which stay in their starting position until removed, the player manipulates each capsule as it vertically falls 1 unit of space at a time, able to move it left or right and rotate it 90 degrees in either clockwise or counter-clockwise.

name: Pool Billiards 3D
description:
Pool Billiards 3D is one of the most realistic and enjoyable pool games available on mobile.
It features many pool game modes like 8 Ball, 9 Ball, UK 8 Ball, Time Trial, Matrix Mode and Practice Mode. So if you're a billiards fan, there is something for you to play in Pool Billiards 3D.

name: Hentai Puzzle Quest
description: Hentai Puzzle Quest is a game that aims to relax through art and lofi music.

name: Iron Kill
description: Like robots, battlebots, robot fighting games? Then Iron Kill is for you!

name: Diver Dash
description:
Diver Dash is a fast-paced scrolling arcade game where you avoid sharks and mines on your endless descent to the ocean floor. Press the screen to stop the obstacles and dash through the gaps.
Compete with your Game Center friends and collect coins and clams to unlock all the wacky characters and themes. What are you waiting for? Dive in today!

name: Dark Walk
description: Close your eyes, let the sound guides you cross the adventure. In this app, you need to draw the correct path according to the different sounds. Try it!

name: JetMan Galactic
description: Jetman Galactic is part of a 3 game series coming to iOS telling the story of earths last action hero.

name: Magic Research
description: Magic Research is a text-based incremental game about Magic. You are the headmaster of a newly-created institution of Magic. Will you be able to lead your school to win the prestigious Tournament of Magic?

name: Goose Ronnie
description: "Goose Ronnie" is an exciting and amusing platformer game that takes you on a journey with the beloved character, Ronnie the Goose. In this game, Ronnie must navigate through various landscapes, all while avoiding dangers and collecting points.

name: Fox4Elite
description: Fox4Elite is a dynamic female FPS and TPS strategic shooter - fast paced and challenging. Lead a team of highly skilled Agents in order to defeat a murderous female clone army. Deploy your Agent fire teams for strategic advantage against the enemy and survive to complete the mission objectives

name: Paccie
description: Paccie is a Pac-Man clone for the Commodore 64.

name: All Day Nippon
description: Bowser has started a mediocre podcast called “All Day Nippon”, so Mario has personally taken it upon himself to put a stop to it!

name: Sonic the Hedgehog: Very Hard Mode
description: The Very Hard Mode difficulty DLC consists of more enemies, being forced to take the hard paths and even going through levels backwards; amigos also get a bigger role in this than in normal gameplay.

name: Black Reliquary
description: Black Reliquary is a total conversion mod for Darkest Dungeon, one which makes sweeping overhauls to gameplay, adds a new story, a new setting, new narration, new music, new enemies, and so very much more. Embark into the distant east and uncover the ancient secrets of the Black Reliquary!

name: Crop Rotation
description: Crop Rotation is a farming-theme card drafting game. Cards are played automatically so you can focus on the deck building and building synergies.

name: Mystery Solitaire: The Black Raven 4
description: Gothic sequel to "Mystery Solitaire. The Black Raven". Breathtaking architecture and mysterious atmosphere.

name: Hitori de Dekirumon! Cooking Densetsu
description: A popular program on NHK Educational TV has become an RPG. Like the show, Mai-chan, the main character, will challenge the RPG. The battle scene with the enemy is in a quiz format.

name: Panda's Village
description: Panda's Village is a real-time strategy and survival game, where you build and upgrade houses, defenses, and stores, fight fierce monkeys, purchase and upgrade weapons and magic and customize your panda. Your goal is to save the village's Capitol at all costs! If you die, you start over.

name: Tangram Collection
description: Tangram Collection offers a fresh spin on a classic tangram game

name: Labyrinth Runner
description: A game for puzzle lovers, everyone knows that there is always a way out of any trouble, also in this game we give you the opportunity to find a way out of the labyrinth.

name: Gangster Life: Criminal Untold , Cars, Theft, Police
description: Gangster Life is the number one game on how to grow from a simple crook into a gangster. Who controls the whole city where you were born and where you will start doing your illegal work. Explore a large detailed city with realistic textures.

name: Sandoria
description: This is a 2D platformer with a conditionally infinite procedurally generated world. A very deep and varied world full of interesting and dangerous things to explore.

name: Oukyuu no Hihou: Tenshon
description: Oukyuu no Hihou: Tenshon is a Role-Playing game, developed and published by Vap, which was released in Japan in 1996.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess Randomizer
description: A randomizer mod for The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword Randomizer
description: A randomizer for the game The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword.

name: Sonic Mania Atmosphere
description: Welcome to Sonic Mania Atmosphere! A complete modpack of new, reimagined and returning zones along with a completely new soundtrack to create a fresh Mania experience unlike any before. The mods and music included are compliled from the best of the gamebanana modding community and Sonic Youtube community musicians to create a fluid and polished 2D Sonic experience from start to finish rivaling that of a sequel game.

name: ​Sonic Robo Blast 2: Official Level Design Collab 2022 - Round 2
description:
The Official Level Design Collab (formally Official Level Design Contest) is a collection of levels from the SRB2 community.

Contributions:
- Auburn Heights Zone, Act 1 - Cool Cat
- Seaside Coast Zone - M/C Industries
- Speed Highway Zone - LucasLixoso
- Lost Fortress Zone, Act 1 - EAJS
- Egg TV Network - Rogerregorroger
- Poison Temple Z Zone - Zaxel Katsugyo
- Greens Hill Zone - RoyKirbs
- Creepy Crypt - Vixuzen

- Shiverside Chasm - M/C Industries

Capture-the-Flag:
- Firmir Nexus Zone - Chuckles troll
- Desolate CTF Zone - CG64

Match/Tag:​

Circuit​:
- Gambit Valley Zone - JABSphere94

Battle Capture-the-Flag:
- Sunset Park Zone, Act 1 - PeneBoi

name: Gênio Box
description: Gênio Box is a spin-off of Genius Quiz where you must select hints to find out what object is inside the box.

name: Genius Quiz DBZ
description: Genius Quiz DBZ is an unofficial-themed version of the Genius Quiz game, now with questions to test your knowledge of the Dragon Ball universe.

name: Genius Quiz Soccer
description: Genius Quiz Soccer is a soccer-themed version of Genius Quiz, with fifty questions that challenge your brain.

name: Ducky's Delivery Service
description: Propeller-powered duck delivery action! In Ducky's Delivery Service, you are a duck who uses a propeller backpack to fly around and deliver mail. Master the flight physics, grow your delivery business, fulfill special delivery requests from other ducks, and earn time attack ranks and high scores.

name: Genius Quiz Christmas
description: Genius Quiz Christmas is a Christmas-themed version of Genius Quiz, with fifty questions that challenge your brain.

name: Genius Quiz HP
description: Genius Quiz HP is an unofficial-themed version of the Genius Quiz game, now with questions to test your knowledge of the Harry Potter universe.

name: Pac-Man
description:
Several newer Pac-Man handheld releases (from the late 2010s onward) feature an original port of the game running on “Firecore” Genesis clone hardware. This port is credited to Piko Interactive in its ROM header, and was reportedly developed by Shiru. The game seems to have considerable slowdown if running on standard Genesis hardware.
The port features three video modes, one of which has the screen rotated on its side (creating an arcade-perfect pixel layout). Different consoles will utilize one of the three modes depending on its form factor.

name: Genius Quiz Reverse
description: Genius Quiz Reverse is a spin-off of Genius Quiz where everything in the game is reversed.

name: Genius Quiz SW
description: Genius Quiz SW is an unofficial-themed version of the Genius Quiz game, now with questions to test your knowledge of the Star Wars universe.

name: SCP-087
description: An experimental stair simulator horror game created by haversine, based on SCP-087. It is one of the first SCP games.

name: Genius Quiz Animes
description: Genius Quiz Animes is an anime-themed version of Genius Quiz, with fifty questions that challenge your brain.

name: Genius Quiz Heroes
description: Genius Quiz Heroes is a superhero-themed version of Genius Quiz, with fifty questions that challenge your brain.

name: Genius Quiz Maker
description: Genius Quiz Maker is a spin-off of Genius Quiz where you can create your own version of the game or play the ones created by your friends.

name: Genius Quiz Animals
description: Genius Quiz Animals is an animal-themed version of Genius Quiz, with fifty questions that challenge your brain.

name: SCP 087 B
description: An SCP-087 remake, which involves a seemingly endless set of descending stairs.

name: Genius Quiz GOT
description: Genius Quiz GOT is an unofficial-themed version of the Genius Quiz game, now with fifty questions to test your knowledge of the Game of Thrones universe.

name: Genius Quiz Countries
description: Genius Quiz Countries is a themed version of Genius Quiz, with fifty questions about various countries that will challenge your brain.

name: Genius Quiz Naru
description: Genius Quiz Naru is an unofficial-themed version of the Genius Quiz game, now with fifty questions to test your knowledge of the Naruto franchise.

name: Genius Quiz Games
description: Genius Quiz Games is a videogame-themed version of Genius Quiz, with fifty questions that challenge your brain.

name: Genius Quiz Science
description: Genius Quiz Science is a science-themed version of Genius Quiz, with fifty questions that challenge your brain.

name: Genius Quiz Royale
description: Genius Quiz Royale is an unofficial-themed version of the Genius Quiz game, now with fifty questions to test your knowledge of the game Clash Royale.

name: Genius Quiz Royale 2
description: Genius Quiz Royale 2 is a sequel to Genius Quiz Royale, with 50 new questions themed around the game Clash Royale.

name: Sonic Adventure Genisys
description: Rumors of a Sonic Adventure remake are floating around in the Sega offices and Tails created a Knuckles Terminator robot to be send back in time and investigate what's going on. And things are going to go a lot more Meta and insane from there on.

name: Genius Quiz LoL
description: Genius Quiz LoL is an unofficial-themed version of the Genius Quiz game, now with fifty questions to test your knowledge of the game League of Legends.

name: Genius Quiz Clans
description: Genius Quiz Clans is an unofficial-themed version of the Genius Quiz game, now with fifty questions to test your knowledge of the game Clash of Clans.

name: Genius Quiz Memes
description: Genius Quiz Science is a meme-themed version of Genius Quiz, with fifty questions that challenge your brain.

name: Genius Quiz Youtubers
description: Genius Quiz Youtubers is a YouTube-themed version of Genius Quiz, with fifty questions that challenge your brain.

name: Genius Quiz TWD
description: Genius Quiz TWD is an unofficial-themed version of the Genius Quiz game, now with fifty questions to test your knowledge of The Walking Dead franchise.

name: Genius Quiz Yugi
description: Genius Quiz Yugi is an unofficial-themed version of the Genius Quiz game, now with fifty questions to test your knowledge of the Yu-Gi-Oh! franchise.

name: Genius Quiz Youtubers 2
description: Genius Quiz Youtubers 2 is a sequel to Genius Quiz Youtubers, with 50 new questions themed around YouTubers.

name: Genius Quiz Rick&M
description: Genius Quiz Rick&M is an unofficial-themed version of the Genius Quiz game, now with fifty questions to test your knowledge of the Rick and Morty series.

name: Genius Quiz Youtubers 3
description: Genius Quiz Youtubers 3 is the third entry of Genius Quiz Youtubers, with 50 new questions themed around YouTubers.

name: Genius Quiz 2018 World Cup
description: Genius Quiz 2018 World Cup is an unofficial-themed version of the Genius Quiz game, now with fifty questions to test your knowledge of the 2018 FIFA World Cup.

name: Genius Quiz Naru 2
description: Genius Quiz Naru 2 is a sequel to Genius Quiz Naru, with 50 new questions themed around the Naruto franchise.

name: Genius Quiz World Cups
description: Genius Quiz World Cups is an unofficial-themed version of the Genius Quiz game, now with fifty questions to test your knowledge of all the editions of the FIFA World Cup.

name: Gênio Quiz Felipe Neto
description: Gênio Quiz Felipe Neto is a spin-off of Genius Quiz themed around Felipe Neto, with 50 questions themed around the YouTuber.

name: Deep Space Scoundrel
description: Deep Space Scoundrel is a rouge-like space adventure where you use a variety of classic arcade mechanics to explore the universe, customize your ship, land at spaceports, and fraternize with other aliens and low-lives.

name: Sex Simulator: Girl on Girl
description: An interactive sex simulation game, featuring high definition graphics and videos with realistic looking characters, set in a beautiful decor. You play the role of a sexy brunette, inviting three girls over at her glamorous apartment, for some wild same-sex experiences.

name: Not the Hero
description: Not the Hero - Yes, you are not the hero in this story, neither are you the right guy. but you will be doing it anyway!

name: Apewar
description: Apewar is an online tactical and action FPS/TPS monkey war game adapted from real life. Build your monkey team and fight against your enemies. By playing in a coordinated way, you can have fun and win with a good strategy. Monkeys are strong together!

name: Gênio Quiz Luccas Neto
description: Gênio Quiz Luccas Neto is a spin-off of Genius Quiz themed around Luccas Neto, with 50 questions themed around the YouTuber.

name: Gênio Quiz Eleições
description: Gênio Quiz Eleições is a themed version of the Genius Quiz game, now with fifty questions to test your knowledge of the 2018 Brazilian Elections.

name: Gênio Quiz Anitta
description: Gênio Quiz Anitta is a spin-off of Genius Quiz themed around Anitta, with 50 questions themed around the Brazilian singer.

name: Gênio Quiz BBB 21
description: Gênio Quiz BBB 21 is an unofficial-themed version of the Genius Quiz game, now with fifty questions to test your knowledge of the 2021 edition of Big Brother Brasil.

name: Banshees: The Game
description: Banshees: The Game distils the film’s plot. You play as a pixelated version of Brendan Gleeson’s character with a singular motive: get to the pub and grab a couple of pints. Annoyingly, Colin Farrell and his beautiful eyebrows are on a mission to repair your friendship, so you’ll need to avoid him, grab five fingers, and sneak to the pub on a Pac-Man grid.

name: Gênio Fly
description: Gênio Fly is a spin-off from Genius Quiz with the style of the bird game that became very famous, but easier.

name: Reach To Neighbor House
description: Just a mini game about reaching neighbor's house with parkour.

name: Genius Quiz Craft
description: Genius Quiz Craft is an unofficial-themed version of the Genius Quiz game, now with fifty questions to test your knowledge of the game Minecraft.

name: Bullet Runner: The First Slaughter
description: Big fucking guns + twin-stick action = Bullet Runner! Combine crazy movement and combat mechanics to dodge, slide, swing and shoot your way to victory! Brutal attacks, adrenaline, speed, power; you get them all. Free to play 4-hour single player campaign and an endless arena mode.

name: Ainmora: The Impending Disaster
description: A captivating RPG with interesting mechanics and unique challenges that will make you think strategically as you admire the immersive history of Ainmora. Think about each choice. Explore carefully. Aziron, Kiarah, Roberit and many others await you in Ainmora.

name: Lethal Dose
description: Top-Down action: Blood, Magic, Stealth, Drugs! Make your own Levels

name: Dream Fire
description: Dream Fire offers a unique and captivating experience, which will keep you in suspense and delight you both with its unique story and graphics, as well as with the fact that you will always have something to do to develop yourself more and more!

name: Dark Traveller
description: Dark Traveller is an action-packed puzzle game with multiple storylines and open endings. The game tells the story of a world on the brink of apocalypse in the distant future. In the world, you travel through quantum space-time to rescue your homeland on the rocks with the help of your partner!

name: Twinsen's Little Big Adventure Remastered 2
description: Built from the ground up, enjoy new breathtaking visuals, enhanced music and improved, deeper gameplay as Twinsen's Little Big Adventure 2 - Remastered reignites the original LBA2/Twinsen's Odyssey game using the latest next-generation technology.

name: Little Big Adventure: Twinsen's Quest
description:
Step into Twinsun's fantastical world in this action-adventure remake! Little Big Adventure - Twinsen's Quest brings brand new visuals, new music by the original composer, and smoother gameplay to the iconic classic released back in 1994.

Embark on a Timeless Adventure, Reimagined

Twinsen is back in this remake featuring a new stylish makeover and modernized gameplay. Faithful to the original game, Little Big Adventure – Twinsen’s Quest takes you on an epic journey on a small planet harboring both magic and technology.

name: Vallen
description: Space combat on a massive scale. Defend your allies, destroy the Xeris and claim victory for the Vallen! Your people need you, fly your ship in an intense battle in an asteroid field to secure the sector.

name: Mafia Clicker
description: Run a Mafia Crew and Build up your City! Try to turn your entire City into a Mafia Empire!

name: Silver Box Classics
description: This collection brings back a gathering of adaptations of the events in the first four Dragonlance role-playing modules, at the beginning of the War of the Lance. These are the first video games adaptations of D&D that started it all.

name: The Callisto Protocol: Contagion Bundle
description: Death is only the beginning in Contagion Mode, The Callisto Protocol's ultimate survival horror experience. Fight tactically and use your ammunition wisely - Contagion Mode's difficulty is custom balanced with stronger enemies and limited resources.

name: Shame Legacy
description: Shame Legacy is a first-person survival-horror, set in a forsaken cultist village. You attempt to survive using stealth and escape. By solving puzzles, you unravel the mystery that's h(a)unting you.

name: Atlas Fallen: Signature Edition
description: Atlas Fallen: Signature Edition is a Focus Entertainment Store exclusive product, strictly limited to 100 copies worldwide. It includes an exclusive artwork by the game's Senior Concept Artist Janine Bertet alongside Art Director James Lowe as a numbered laminated wooden frame (artwork printed on wood), a certificate of authenticity hand-signed by the artist, a digital or a physical copy of the game for the platform of your choice using James Lowe’s artwork as an exclusive box art and the Ruin Rising Pack DLC.

name: Primal Carnage: Extinction - Prehistoric Legacy
description: Deck out your dinosaurs with over 200 unique looks!

name: Primal Carnage: Extinction - Mercenary Megapack
description: Go dino slaying in style with over 100 mercenary cosmetics!

name: For Honor: Pirate Hero Skin
description: Become a rogue warrior with the Hero Skin of Inquisitor Yinchen, a full-body customization of the Pirate.

name: Mine Shaft
description: Addictive mining game where players dig deeper into the earth to find valuable minerals and upgrade their equipment. Beware of earthquakes that can damage your mine, and use explosives strategically to clear your way.

name: Blood and Zombies: Gold Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Monster Prom 3: Monster Roadtrip - Hitchhiker Pack: Vicky & Brian
description: Sin descripción

name: Genius Quiz OP
description: Genius Quiz OP is an unofficial-themed version of the Genius Quiz game, now with fifty questions to test your knowledge of the One Piece franchise.

name: Gênio Quiz Poke 2
description: Gênio Quiz Poke 2 is a sequel to Genius Quiz Poke, with 50 new questions themed around the Pokémon franchise.

name: Genius Quiz Fort. Battle Royale
description: Genius Quiz Fort. Battle Royale is an unofficial-themed version of the Genius Quiz game, now with fifty questions to test your knowledge of the game Fortnite.

name: Tetsudou Nippon! Rosen Tabi: Akechi Tetsudou-hen
description:
A train simulation game from Sonic Powered's "Japanese Rail Sim" series.

In this entry, you can drive through a 25.1 km trip from Ena Station to Akechi Station, on Akechi Railway's Akechi Line. Pointing and calling actions in Narikiri driving mode and a slowdown brake used on downhills have been implemented here.

This game supports Zuiki's Densha de GO!! one-handle controller for the Nintendo Switch.

name: The Wagadu Chronicles
description: The Wagadu Chronicles is a Role-Play-First Afrofantasy MMORPG featuring multiplayer synchronous turn-based combat, communal settlement building and capture, and a cinematic dialogue mode.

name: Data Delivery Agents
description: An edutainment puzzle game about the principles of ubiquitous connectivity. Help Ebi deliver packets across the world wide web; build paths using directional tiles across over 30 different levels.

name: Dino Fighters
description: A fighting game featuring chibi dinosaurs, developed for Sega Genesis using Hamoopig & SGDK, by Juca Jacaré

name: Welcome Kokuri-san
description: Welcome Kokuri-san is a visual novel starring the VTuber Kurune Kokuri. The story is fully voiced, and will include scenes with realistic ASMR voices, so you can enjoy the scenario “as if you were there.”

name: Paper Snow
description:
Paper Snow is a yuri kinetic novel about the pain and joy of knowing someone you love is happy without you.

At some point in life, your path might diverge from the people you least expect to say goodbye to. There is no set when and where for this momentous event. No red circled reminder on a calendar, no ear-marked page on a journal. There is no indicator for the last time you’ll ever meet someone. Only the memory of it, after it’s all over.

name: Team17 Collection 1
description:
Team17 Collection 1 for Evercade brings together a diverse selection of 16-bit home computer classics first published on Amiga, including the atmospheric sci-fi shooters of the Alien Breed series, the bone-crunching fighting of Body Blows, the accessible sporting action of Arcade Pool and Kingpin, and much more!

Legal Amiga emulation for the first time on a handheld device means that people can take these home computer favourites on the go!

Includes:
- Arcade Pool
- Alien Breed Special Edition ‘92
- Alien Breed 2
- Alien Breed: Tower Assault
- ATR: All Terrain Racing
- Body Blows
- Full Contact
- Kingpin: Arcade Sports Series Bowling
- Project X: Special Edition '93
- Qwak

name: Piko Interactive Collection 3
description:
Piko Interactive returns to Evercade with 10 more great games from multiple systems, including cult favourites and previously unreleased titles!

Piko Interactive Collection 3 for Evercade brings together a diverse range of games, including whimsical 32-bit platformer 40 Winks, the technically impressive 16-bit first-person shooter Zero Tolerance, epic 16-bit RPG Legend of Wukong and many more!

Includes:
- 40 Winks (32-bit)
- Legend of Wukong
- Metal Mech: Man & Machine
- Motor City Patrol
- Punch King
- Radikal Bikers (Previously Unreleased)
- Stanley: The Search for Dr. Livingston
- Super Bubble Pop
- Sword of Sodan
- Zero Tolerance

name: Mini Doom
description: Mini DOOM is very short tribute game based on Doom 1. It transforms the classic FPS into a 2D action platformer. Collect keys and battle your way through 5 stages with the classic Doom weapons, powerups and enemies.

name: Are We Thawing
description:
An ex-detective stumbles upon a crime he wasn't supposed to know about and is now complicit in the death of a God.

You play as Noelle Blanche, an ex-detective belonging to the Kingdom of Winter. As times begin to change, the seasons find themselves at war. The Winter Kingdom's biggest enemy the Summer Kingdom is advancing. And Noelle never thought he himself would be at the center of this conflict...

name: We're Back! A Dinosaur's Story
description: This version features characters from the movie, but does not follow the storyline of the movie. In this version, Professor Screw Eyes has kidnapped Louie and Cecilia. Hearing of this, Captain Neweyes and the dinosaurs launch into action to save their friends by traveling through various time periods.

name: Trashmorfers
description: In the future, the unrecycled trash takes a monstrous form, known as Trashmorfers & dominates the world. Save the earth from destructive pollution before it's late for the human kind 3rd& 1stPerson Destroy PVCs, Trashmen & WEEEs Multiplayer soon

name: Expedition Agartha: Supporter Pack
description: You've just uncovered our brand new DLC; The Varangian Guard Armor, Steel Pagoda Armor, and Astradhari Armor sets! Other perks include Increased Stash size, bonus backpacks and starter loot every season. So what are you waiting for? Snatch our Supporter Pack for your next expedition!

name: Cyber Lust
description: Cyber Lust is an adult game set in a cyberpunk world.

name: Shapey Heads
description:
Welcome to the colorful 8-bit world of Shapey Heads!
Tap the screen to switch the shape of your head to avoid all of the traps and obstacles!
Collect coins to open up secret boxes that will let you play with over 40 of the craziest characters through 5 different challenging worlds.
Run as long as you can to improve your high score and climb the leaderboards!

name: Lunar Laser
description: Tap to push you through space. Avoid all lasers and obstacles and collect as many stars as you can.

name: Cat Cafe: Dessert Panic
description: Cat Cafe Dessert Panic! Is an action-adventure game where you, as Pera, are the waitress at a cafe for cats. The cats are excited to eat, and they'll do anything to get in your way. Do not drop the desserts or it's game over!

name: Harvest Season: Sudoku Puzzle
description:
If you love classic sudoku, mixed with innovative puzzle elements, you are in the right place!
Welcome to Harvest Season, the game that will forever change the way you play Sudoku!
Embark on an exciting journey with Abi and her fruit buddies as they travel through a beautifully crafted world and solve addictive puzzles!

name: Cross or Crash
description:
A unique puzzle game never seen before!
Get the exact timing on the congested road so that characters do not crash with each other and fire!

A match3 game with unique gameplay, beautiful background and many hidden achievement wait for you to discover.
You will diving deep into the ocean through the game to discover the ocean and sea creatures.

name: The Track Star
description: Are you the new drag strip champion? Take your talents to the track and race in the high stakes drag race.

name: Squared: Adjacent Stones
description: In this Puzzle / Logic game you need to convert enough stones from the field to win the level. The amount of necessary stones will vary and there is an AI Opponent who will try to out-play you. You can only move in straight lines from stones that you already control. Stones that you move over, will fall into your control.

name: Zig Zag Boom
description:
Control an orb ball along the zigzag path and don't hit the wall.
Tap to switch the direction! How fast can you react?
Sound simple? Challenge yourself in this amazing free arcade game!

name: Chariot Racer
description:
A battle to the death!
Avoid the monsters, bloodied spikes, flying spears, and blasts of fire as you race around the coliseum track in a battle for survival! Challenge your friends to best your time! Survive long enough and be rewarded the coveted "3rd Star".

name: Dungeon Creator
description: This is an online 2D platform game about dungeon, where you can build scenes and take adventures. You can not only design your own dungeon, but also challenge dungeons of other game players.We provide a wealth of dungeon game material. It's totally up to you to decide the layout of the entire dungeon, as well as the placement of each trap and enemy!Also you can take adventures in almost unlimited number of dungeons created by other players, plunder their treasure, and show them your super game skills!

name: Blight Night: You Are Not Safe
description:
Video may have killed the radio star, but a supposed flu outbreak may have killed humanity leaving one man to survive the horrors of the aftermath.
West Texas, 1986. Sonny Barstow relished small-town life. The ever looming mystery of why he awoke seemingly untouched by the ravages of the bizarre outbreak.
Part 1980s horror flick, part puzzle-solving adventure, Blight Night shoots for exceptional exploration and discovery — without sacrificing the splatterfest.

name: Death Moto
description: Come and experience gives you unlimited pleasure, you know!

name: X-Rush
description: Sin descripción

name: Redline Rush
description: Jump into a super sports car and test your driving skills in this high speed driving game where you have to weave through traffic to escape the police. Avoid crashes, take down traffic cars, pick up power-ups and walk to the top of the leaderboard! This game will challenge even the most skilled arcade racing fans.

name: Aby Escape
description: Help poor Aby, the unluckiest and clumsiest raccoon, escape from his assailants. Whether being pursued by the hunters in his native forest, by the police in town or by the bikers on Route 66.5, Aby never stops running to escape from all these dangers.

name: A Day Out with Ube
description: "It's another grey morning here in the Matamis' mansion, you pry your eyes open to the bright grey clouds with your consciousness finally creeping in to get you awake. Though, this day doesn't really seem to be like any other day you've had. In fact, you might just be in for a day out for one of the missus' kids." -some lunatic trying to narrate this

name: Revenant
description: Revenant is a pixel-art style shooting game set in the near future.

name: Metal War
description: This is a fast-paced top-down shooting and tower defense game. You need to customize and upgrade your chariot, build defensive structures to protect your base, explore the world and destroy all enemies! Don't forget to come back and defend when the enemy attacks! Can you make it to the end?

name: The Banished Vault
description: A strategy game of exploration, endurance, and space travel on an interstellar gothic monastery. Explore solar systems, harvest resources, construct outposts, and face hazards in the challenging universe of The Banished Vault.

name: Sinister Turmoil: Sewers
description: Below the abandoned Fredbear and Friends Funland, horrors lurk in the shadows. Mangle has been unleashed into the sewers and you have been locked down there with it. While navigating a series of tunnels and rooms you must find a way out, as well as avoiding the monsters that only have one agenda, to kill you.

name: Escape The Ayuwoki Horror Fort
description:
The long-awaited release of the escape the Ayuwoki for mobile devices!

Each time you hear Ayuwoki Hee Hee run and hide from Ayuwoki!

Say hello to your new neighbor the Ayuwoki and escape this jacksons mansion. Each time you hear ayuwoki hee hee, run and hide as your new neighbor eni ayuwoki, who keeps you in jacksons fort prison, is running to get rid of you. Do your best to escape the jacksons fort prison to forget the horror of the ayuwoki. Run as fast as you can, hide under every available piece of furniture, and do everything to escape from the eni ayuwoki. When you hear ayuwoki hee hee, you better hurry as your new neighbor is incoming. Escape jacksons manor in our new horror escapade simulator: Escape The Ayuwoki Horror Fort. Escape the ayuwoki and jacksons fort prison to forget the horror of ayuwoki hee hee.

In this horror escapade simulator, your objective is to escape the jacksons mansion. To complete such a task, you should be very careful because your new neighbor The Ayuwoki can hear you, so be very careful when you run, jump or open the doors of the jacksons manor. Actually, any noise could attract eni ayuwoki, if The Ayuwoki is close enough to hear it. If you are hidden, but your flashlight is turned on, eni Ayuwoki will still be able to catch you, so to truly be hidden, turn off the flashlight while you are hiding inside, under or behind some piece of furniture in the jacksons mansion.

First, you have to find the main gate key in the jacksons prisons fort. The key could be anywhere in the manor. Also, you can hide behind objects, inside some furniture or under the tables. Once you obtain the key, just go for the main gate of the jacksons fort prison to unlock it and escape the mansion. Sounds simple, right? The key icon will appear on the screen, once you collected the key. Other state icons will tell you what you are doing, if staying idle, walking, running, etc. Put close attention when the icon turns into an eye with a crossed line. It means you are hidden and The Ayuwoki will not be able to catch you. Do your best and escape the jacksons mansion in our horror escapade simulator. Once you escape the fort prison, you will be able to forget the ayuwoki hee hee for a long time.

Escape The Ayuwoki Horror Fort is a free to play horror escapade simulator in which you will have to escape the jacksons mansion of the eni ayuwoki. Do your best and Escape the Ayuwoki in this horror escapade and escape the manor. Remember, you can guess where eni ayuwoki is when you hear the ayuwoki hee hee. Just find the key and escape the jacksons mansion and your neighbor The Ayuwoki. Download our new horror escapade simulator and Escape the Ayuwoki now. Your new neighbor The Ayuwoki is waiting for you in his fort prison.

name: Birds and Blocks 2
description: The Birds are back with 120 new levels!

name: Lockdown VR: Forgotten Temple
description: Archaeologists claimed to have discovered an ancient temple that has been forgotten for centuries. All the tomb raiders are now trying to locate it but you seem to be the first to find it after a long search. Will you be able to find any treasures before the others arrive?

name: Ultimate Anime Jigsaw Puzzle
description: Kawaii girls are broken into pieces. Can you reunite them by completing these jigsaw puzzles?

name: Rally Race Car Simulator Poly: World Driver Arcade Real Driving Games Sim
description: Ready, set, go! Get behind the wheel and let's hit the road for an adrenaline-fueled car game!

name: Quiz 4 All
description: Do you like Quiz games? Use your knowledge and challenge your friends to play this fun quiz game. Quiz 4 All is perfect for group fun!

name: Pixtalgia
description: Pixtalgia is a 2D Retro Platformer on the Wax blockchain.

name: True Beauty
description: Make it pop! A 1-on-1 Stylish Puzzle Matching Game True Beauty.

name: Democracy 4: Event Pack
description: Give Democracy 4 a boost with these extra events to liven up the game. Will you still be able to maintain control of the country, and command the respect of the voters? or will your term in office be derailed by the tragic course of events!

name: Tactical Assault VR
description: Virtual Reality Tactical Shooter centered around CQB (close-quarters battles). Play solo or multiplayer coop to breach doors, clear rooms and defeat the enemy threat.

name: Guardian of Dynamite: A Bomb Protector
description: It is a puzzle-type mini-game that slows down the time bomb in the dynamite barrel with simple key operations, simple mathematical formulas, and key input, and endures until the time the bomb is dismantled. Will you be able to save the city by holding out until the time to defuse the bomb?

name: Devil Slayer: Raksasi - Incarnation of Darkness
description: A mysterious person used an ancient technique to create eight beings from Soul Crystals. These beings became known as the Charim—a race whose far more arduous trials take place in the [Incarnation of Darkness].

name: The Legend of Zelda: Oracle of Ages Randomizer
description: A randomizer mod for The Legend of Zelda: Oracle of Ages.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Oracle of Seasons Randomizer
description: A randomizer mod for The Legend of Zelda: Oracle of Seasons.

name: SCP-087-B Extended Edition
description: This mod expands SCP-087-B by giving it new content, such as new floors, events, monsters, and also introduces some new features

name: The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening DX Randomizer
description: A randomizer mod for The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening DX.

name: Thomas & Friends: Up, Up and Away! Diesel's Special Delivery
description: Up, Up and Away! Diesel's Special Delivery is a video game that was released for Vtech's V. Reader System. It was released in 2012.

name: The Little Engine That Could
description: A Merry Engine is pulling cars filled with toys and food for the good boys and girls when it cannot go any further. The little clown asks some other Engines for help but all of them refuse to pull the train. Finally, a little Blue Engine pulls the train over the mountain with her spirit and determination, telling herself "I think I can, I think I can, I think I can." Join the Little Engine on her journey and learn the importance of bravery and courage.

name: Scooby-Doo and a Mummy, Too!
description: When the Egyptian exhibit at the university falls under the attack of one of its own exhibits, someone needs to step in and save the day. The Mystery Gang is on the job in another confounding conundrum, and you're here to help them out. One of the mummies has mysteriously reanimated and is doing his best to stop everyone in their tracks. Help these meddling kids while keeping an eye out for the toilet-paper tyrant — one look and he'll turn you into stone. Get on the case and dig up some concrete evidence to put this villain away.Scooby-Doo and a Mummy Too lands you in the middle of a heart-pumping adventure. Employ your reading skills to help the Mystery Gang save the day.

name: Sonic Robo Blast 2: Cacee "Kiwi" Cactus
description:
A character addon for Sonic Robo Blast 2.

Cacee "Kiwi" Cactus is here from Mirage Saloon Zone! She used to be a bandito, but she's given up her days of crime... mostly.

name: Sonic R Characters: Metal Knuckles & Tails Doll
description:
A character pack for Sonic Robo Blast 2.

After being disowned by their creator after their failure to acquire the Chaos Emeralds in Sonic R, Metal Knuckles and Tails Doll join Sonic and Co. to take down Dr. Eggman! This duo of doppelgangers have returned from their previous outing with some new tricks that players can utilize to explore stages in brand new ways, similar to that of their original organic counterparts.

name: Horace to the Rescue
description: Horace to the Rescue is a cancelled game for the ZX Spectrum.

name: Chi Ninja
description: In a world full of ninjas chi ninja will fight his way to freedom a fast pace speed runner platformer with sharp ninja moves grappling hock and ninja stars aswell as a katana will our hero survive the ninja army.

name: Touhou: New World
description: Delve back into the world of Touhou in this bullet hell action-RPG adventure! The boundary between Gensokyo and the outside world has been breached, and it falls to Reimu Hakurei and Marisa Kirisame to discover why. Level up skills, forge new equipment, and explore Gensokyo to uncover the truth!

name: Captain Dodger: The Hidden Cargo
description: After clearing the port and killing his enemies, Captain Dodger enters the pirate ship. Avoid their traps and try to unlock all the doors. Be careful though. The pirates have made it pretty tough to navigate their ship hull. Who knows what kind of cargo they might hide in there. Time to unravel the mystery.

name: Deathchron
description: Deathchron is an action side scroller where you play as a kid that finds an amazing mech to save the world.

name: Bases Loaded
description: Swing for the fences! Reach level 20 to win.

name: Oh no! More Lemmings
description: This port of Oh No! More Lemmings sees the resolution noticeably increase compared to the original, which can be very obvious when viewing the lemming sprites. The soundtrack also gets clearer and in better quality overall.

name: Dear Magi: Mahou Shounen Gakka
description: Remake of the original mobile game with reworked plot and mechanics.

name: SCP-087-B
description: Sin descripción

name: Shinobi Harisenbo
description:
Otome game by Spice+.
Set during the Sengoku era, a short story about a princess and her shinobi guard.

name: Dr Smart Space Encyclopedia
description: Set out on an epic adventure through the Solar System. A journey of a lifetime alongside Dr Smart, and his reliable Cosmic Encyclopedia.

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Complete Edition
description:
Draw and Color: Kawaii is your path into the world of adorable delicacies! Use different drawing tools and have some tasty fun!
Coloring books are a great way to spend your time. It is a good way to settle the nerves and relax! It also develops your brain... just like eating fish. Use one of the premade templates or create your own illustrations.

name: Distant Worlds 2: Factions - Ikkuro and Dhayut
description: Sin descripción

name: Groove Coaster: Wai Wai Party!!!! - Hololive Pack
description: Rhythm Game x Roller Coaster!!!!

name: Escape From the Depth
description: Escape From the Depth is a cosmic horror game that takes place in a submarine under the dark, cold, and desolate oceans of Europa. The player must survive while trying to collect the necessary items to safely evacuate the sinking submarine.

name: Gems of Magic: Double Pack
description:
Rescue the Fuzzy family and save the enchanted forest in 100 challenging levels!

Embark on an enchanting adventure to find your destiny by rebuilding the forest village and fend off the goblins in this exciting Match 3 adventure!

name: Arcade Archives: Thunder Ceptor II
description: Take a seat in the cockpit and blast off into space!

name: Tuya
description: The protagonist returns to his parents' house in a hurry after hearing the news of his grandfather's death, and there he meets a terrifying sight!

name: Swords & Bones: Special Edition
description: The demon world invades humanity every 500 years. The Wolf Demon has been bullying the Kingdom of Vestus and it seems that there is no hope. But there’s one hero who can put an end to it - you - a nameless warrior with a sword in hand. What are you waiting for?

name: Isle of Jura Fishing Trip
description: Visit the remarkable Isle of Jura and catch some delicious fish!

name: Uzzuzzu My Pet
description: Hop into the lives of four adorable animals. Uzzuzzu My Pet lets you experience a wacky world of absurd scenarios. Relax and sink into the world they inhabit.

name: Life of Slime
description: Life of Slime is a cute story game in which you have to play as a slime named Slami.

name: Flea the Cat
description: Flea the Cat is an endless runner, in which you play a ninja, known as Squeek. Slice and chomp your way through crowds as you attempt to escape the clutches of the demonic cat that hunts you in this living nightmare.

name: Pangya: United
description: Anime-style golfing MMO.

name: McDonald's Original: Happy Disc
description:
A happy meal demo disc for the PlayStation 2 with Parappa the Rapper 2 and Ape Escape 2001, with McDonalds themes and bonuses.
Contains the first level of PaRappa the Rapper 2 which was changed to resemble a McDonald's restaurant.

name: Uniform Girl
description: This is a search for beautiful girls. Through the wiping of the gentlemen, the girls and girls interact to trigger the unlocking of all CG.

name: Mekakare
description: In development otome game.

name: Key La Box
description: In development otome game.

name: Warspace
description: Warspace is a arcade space shooter game.

name: Qualia/Delta
description: A in-development PC otome game.

name: Utakata no Uchronia
description: Fantasy otome game for Switch.

name: Akuma Ouji to Ayatsuri Ningyou
description: A mobile otome game.

name: Yami-iro no Maju
description: Otome game by Daisy2.

name: Cooped Up
description:
You are the latest addition in the exotic bird sanctuary. The other older birds have been Cooped Up a little too long and are a branch short of a perch! Ahhemmm... they is a bit crazy!
Fling yourself up up and away but watch out, there's more than just birds that you must avoid. However don't be afraid to snack on the way...

name: Junsei Yasaotoko
description: A shoujo manga style romcom otome game.

name: Junsei Yasaotoko Sweet & Bitter
description: TyranoScript remake with 3 new heroes.

name: Backbeat and Hexagroove: Music Strategy Bundle
description: Two unique takes on music games, together at a great price. Enjoy contemplative puzzling in Backbeat, and fast-paced rhythm action in Hexagroove: Tactical DJ.

name: Logic Games Bundle
description: Three Logic Games in One Bundle!

name: Type: Jump
description: Sin descripción

name: Wandering
description: Sin descripción

name: Half-Life: MMod
description: Half-Life 1: MMod is a free, fan made modification for Half-Life aiming to refine player's arsenal and further expand player's combat options. Featuring AI tweaks, VFX and SFX overhaul in spirit of original, additional weapon functionality and bug fixes, while keeping most changes optional.

name: Dyad
description: Sin descripción

name: Taxi of the Asteroids
description: Sin descripción

name: Go!Go! Usa-chan Ressha
description: This title was developed by Ken Takahashi and co-produced by Miya Ayako. The game is based in Konami's Loco-Motion, and the player has to collect the carrots and go through the outer tracks to clear the stages.

name: Dr. Fetus' Mean Meat Machine
description: Help Dr. Fetus create the perfect Meat Boy clone in a unique new twist on the tile-matching puzzle genre. In classic Meat Boy fashion, an endless cavalcade of devious and deadly traps stand between you and victory in this hardcore puzzle game that will push your skills to the limit.

name: Doki Doki! RainClouds
description: Doki Doki! RainClouds is a fan game that makes you play through DDLC’s original Act I with Sayori’s point of view.

name: Shatter Bot
description: Shatter the shackles of corporate tyranny in this action-packed shooter-platformer. Upgrade your ShatterBot, unlock new weapons, and blast all around you to smithereens! Features fully destructible, procedurally generated levels, guaranteed to challenge even the most experienced robo pilot.

name: Aladdin II
description: Aladdin II (not to be confused with the Sega Mega Drive pirate of the same name) is a pirated port of the official Sega Mega Drive version of Aladdin, made for the Famicom and released in mid-1995 by Chengdu Tai Jing Da Dong Computer Co.

developers.name: Chengdu Tai Jing Da Dong Computer Co

name: Contra Spirits
description: Contra Spirits, also known as Super Contra 3, is a pirated Famicom port of Contra III: The Alien Wars (Contra Spirits in Japan and Super Probotector: Alien Rebels in Europe) for the SNES, made by Ei-How Yang (and possibly others) in 1995. It was only released in 1997.

name: AV Pachinko
description: AV Pachinko also known as AV Super Real Pachinko is an adult-originated pachinko simulation game developed by C&E and published by Hacker International in 1991.

name: BomberBoy
description: BomberBoy is a port of the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive game Mega Bomberman (itself a port of the PC Engine/TurboGrafx-16 game Bomberman '94) for the Famicom made by Super Game and released on a multicart in 1997 by an unknown publisher. While being only released in 1997, it appears to be Super Game's first title, made around 1995 and unfinished for unknown reasons.

name: Boogerman
description:
Super Boogerman is a Famicom port of Boogerman: A Pick and Flick Adventure, originally released for Sega Mega Drive and Super Nintendo. It was produced by Super Game and published by Realtec.

The game is a recreation of the original Boogerman, but is considerably less faithful than Boogerman II: The Final Adventure, with a mixed-up level order and severely limited abilities for the player, which is compensated for by providing infinite ammo.

Like many of Super Game's other bootlegs, this game has no ending; after the player defeats the third boss, the game merely resets.

name: Boogerman II: The Final Adventure
description:
Boogerman II: The Final Adventure is an unlicensed port of the Mega Drive version of Boogerman: A Pick and Flick Adventure, made by Rex Soft in 1997.

The gameplay is slow, and the controls are far less responsive than Super Game's version. There are 2 extra powers than what Super Game's version had: Belch and the Flame Gas ability (This power only works if pressing A, B, And Select all at once), but lacks garbage piles and the Milk Jug powerup. Also, it has two bosses removed from Super Game's version: FlyBoy and Revolta. The music in this version is more recognizable than Super Game's version. In the story intro, the text is scrolling up, instead of paragraphs, and lacks the animation of Boogerman cleaning the room. Super Game's version combines all four levels into one 1 Level each, but Boogerman II has only 2 of the four levels, separately, like Earthworm Jim 3 by Hummer Team, also made in 1997.

name: Kabuto Kuwagata
description:
Beetle battle game from Corocoro Comic!

One day, the main character, who loves beetles and stag beetles, warps into another world where giant insects live. There, the insects have gone berserk and are attacking people!
The main character grows a beetle stag beetle and fights against the rampaging insects to unravel the mystery!
Will the hero be able to safely return to the Earth?

name: Nico Yazawa is Dreaming
description:
When Nico-chan woke up one day, she found herself inside a mysterious dream world!!
Joined by the rest of μ's, she embarks on a great adventure!
Beset by many strange and cute creatures, she must bring a smile to all of them!
Aim to become the number one idol in the universe!

name: Decathlon
description:
The game can be played alone or with a friend. It offers 2 different modes: Single game (play only one sport) or Full game (play them all). The player can compete in these sports disciplines:

- 100-meters
- Long Jump
- Shot put
- High Jump
- 400-meters
- 110-meters hurdles
- Discus throw
- Pole vault
- Javelin throw
- 1500-meters

name: Dragon Ball Z 5
description: Dragon Ball Z 5 is an unlicensed Beat 'em up for the Famicom, based on the Dragon Ball Z anime. It was released around 1995.

name: Earthworm Jim 2
description: Earthworm Jim 2 (蚯蚓吉姆2) is an unlicensed port of the game of the same name, made for the Famicom by a team of (or at least related to) Ex-Sachen developers and published by Ka Sheng in 1996.

name: Earthworm Jim 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Let's! Revolution!
description: In Let's Revolution, embark on a deadly game of hide and seek as you decipher numbered clues to uncover the path to your goals. Chase down the cowardly King through the realms of Beebom while facing off against a host of enemies. Gear up along the way with powerful items and abilities for a final showdown in Beebom City.

name: Closer the Distance
description: Closer the Distance is a slice-of-life sim that tells a deeply emotional story about the connections between family and friends in the face of tragedy. Unearth long kept secrets, repair strained relationships, and help your loved ones move on.

name: Golden Memory 2
description: Golden Memory 2 is a re-imagining of the universe of Five Nights at Freddy's

name: Operation Ushkurat
description: Operation Ushkurat is a 1989 action-adventure game in which you are on board a spaceship with a time bomb that you must defuse in time.

name: Greed of Man
description: Greed of Man is an open world multiplayer game where you live in a town built and ran by real players. Players can buy and own their own Houses that they can decorate as they wish. There is an in game economy also influenced by players. Players can choose to start their own jobs and run their own legal businesses like shops and factories, but they can also get a little more spicy with their money by constructing underground black market business like drug and weapons cratering. And not only can players purchase properties but they can also build one, or hire a construction company to build one. You can also rob other peoples business, but be aware of players playing as cops as they can always stop you in your conquest of crime.

name: Flighty Chicken
description: Fēng Kuáng Jīdàn Zǐ (also known as "Flighty Chicken") is a Tamagotchi clone developed by Waixing for the Famicom.

name: Hell Fighter
description: Hell Fighter is an unlicensed game released by Sachen in 1991 for the NES and Famicom.

name: Hidden Chinese Chess
description: Sin descripción

name: Mickey Mania 7
description: Mickey Mania 7 (米奇吉鼠) is a pirated port of Mickey Mania: The Timeless Adventures of Mickey Mouse, released on the Famicom. It was developed by Ei-How Yang in 1996 and is the second game that was developed for J.Y. Company.

name: Ra Ra Boom
description: Ra Ra Boom is a 2D, co-op beat ’em up driven by a coming-of-age narrative about a group of ninja cheerleaders from space in a fight to save the rest of humanity on Earth.

name: Super Mario Bros. Crowd Control
description: A rom hack for Super Mario Bros. where Twitch chat can interact with the game by giving the player various advantages and disadvantages during gameplay.

name: The Faces of Evil Remastered Randomizer
description: A randomizer mod for The Faces of Evil Remastered.

name: The Wand of Gamelon Remastered Randomizer
description: A randomizer mod for The Wand of Gamelon Remastered.

name: Wild
description: When you’re ready, start winning coins in a card game party online with players worldwide. You don’t even have to unlock any of the features to play card games with friends.

name: Uno Online
description:
Uno Card Game the fun, classic card game that is the favourite of all the card games. Its really easy to pick up and play and difficult to put down. Its simple to play but still has a strategic component to it

The objective of Uno Card Game is to empty all your cards before the other players get rid of theirs. The player reduces cards by discarding cards that match the top card in the Discard pile.

name: Bunny Bye-Bye
description: You control bobe, the little alien as they clean their space station of dust bunnies with their handy clean0tron.

name: 1-900-Cult
description: Under the neon shadows of Miami, a mysterious cult searches for a way to bring about an end to life- and death- as we know it. Who will stop their horrific summons?

name: Fishing and Life
description:
Fishing is to Heal your heart. Don't worry. It will be ok.

We introduce the most beautiful and peaceful game to you who's tired and exhausted from daily life. Enjoy fishing whales just with a simple control while listening to the sound of waves ASMR at the beautiful sea.

name: Miniplanet
description: Miniplanet is a virtual world game that you could play on Facebook or Bebo.

name: Kunado Chronicles
description:
You wake up from a cold sleep upside-down in a tree. Watch out—It's the future.
In a world destroyed by ineffable monsters with no hearts, but an iron will; in a society warped and shaped by the constant threat of ruin; the dragon is already dead: Help what's left of humanity learn how to live in this post-apocalyptic fantasy visual novel.

name: Castelo Negro
description: Castelo Negro is a text-based adventure developed by PISC where you need to find a portal to the black castle and get treasures.

name: A Maldição da Vila Sinistra
description: A Maldição da Vila Sinistra is a text-based adventure developed by PISC where you need to uncover an abandoned village.

name: A Taça Mágica
description: A Taça Mágica is a text-based adventure where you are tasked with searching a magic goblet.

name: Popful Mail
description: Mail is a young, cute, enthusiastic female bounty-hunting elf. Unfortunately, every time a bounty is near, something goes wrong: the last case was particularly painful, involving Mail bravely cutting off the head of a famous criminal - only to realize that his body escaped without the head. Mail tried at least to sell the head in the nearest town, but discovered that the local tavern was full of these heads stored in a basket. But not all is lost: Mail reads a poster that promises a big reward for someone who catches an evil wizard who terrorizes the land. Sounds like just the job Mail was looking for!

name: Popful Mail
description: The cute bounty hunter known as Popful Mail looks like she would have no trouble making a living slashing bad guys with her sword. In reality Mail is having a hard time making ends meet. One day, however, she learns about a magician who has gone rogue and has a hefty bounty on his head. Her adventure begins as Popful fights her way through a new adventure, and makes new friends along the way.

name: Engage Kill
description:
Engage Kill is fully voiced adventure game with a character gacha system.
Its combat uses 3 character squads against waves of enemies with a turn-based system where the action order is visible while choosing action commands.
Completing combat tasks by using specific commands activates special attacks and increases the special gauge for stronger attacks but also adding more difficult tasks to complete.

Engage Kill was created as part of a mixed-media project called Project Engage, it was announced alongside an anime and manga called Engage Kiss.

name: Kitten Home: Neko Collector
description: In Florence story, a little calico cat named Sweetie moved to the new condo with Emily. When she opened the doors, the condo was empty and dirty. What to do first? Of course, collect gold and gather love to build your dream home with kawaii cozy rooms for a happy single girl like Emily and enjoy beautiful life with furry little cat Sweetie like in cat and mouse game. Emily loves Florence and is a tofu neko collector, she loves to adopt as many furry cats as possible. Imagine when you open the doors, they will run around in the cozy condo and found everywhere you go. Don’t forget to feed them tofu and take care of them as in Tamagotchi game for cat and mouse.

name: Neko Crush
description: Meow! You just met a unique cat. With its help, you’ll be able to become an excellent interior designer, step by step! Apartments, seaside villas, manors... there are all kinds of houses in Neko Crush waiting for you to design and decorate. Try your best to satisfy the clients’ needs, and fully unleash your creativity!

name: Bagels
description: Bagels is a mastermind game where the player must guess the computer's code. Codes consist of three numbers. After each guess of the player, the computer answers fermi (one digit is at the right position), pico (one digit is in the code but on a different position), or bagels (none of the digits are correct). The goal is to guess the number in as few tries as possible, so players must use the answers to infer the right code.

name: The Legend of Zelda Randomizer
description: Have you ever wanted to replay the Legend of Zelda, but played it so often that you can't get it out of your head? Similar to many other randomizers out there, this can shuffle the game as you like to allow you to re-experience Zelda each time that you play it.

name: Arcade! Classic Arcade Pack
description: Experience the original sights, sounds, and gameplay that made these games classics in the arcade. Every roar and flash is identical to the original. Arcade Classic Arcade Pack includes nine games: Asteroids, PacMan, Frogger, Hexxagon, Pong, Snake, Space Invaders, Tetris, and Tic Tac Toe. The software includes online score-keeping capabilities so you can compete against players worldwide.

name: Time Lock VR 2
description:
Mystical version of the Timelock VR Games series.

The player has to free the soul of the ancestor imprisoned by the sorcerer in a magic stone. To solve riddles, you will need to move in time. Be careful, at the time of moving something may go wrong.

In a dream, the player is his ancestor and asks to free his soul. Find a place in which the element is hidden in which his soul is imprisoned.

name: Clash of Evil
description: Clash of Evil is the first action-packed fighting game, using the worlds scariest characters, such as Slender, Jeff the Killer, Sonic.EXE etc. Join online against friends using your favorite character to battle out and rise to the top. Prove who is the scariest of them all. Play Story mode to learn each character's journey. Change up your style and add color in Clash of Evil Store. More Characters and Maps will be available to play in oncoming updates.

name: Putt-Putt's Fun House
description: Putt-Putt's Fun House is a series of interactive fun learning activities for kids ages 4-7 years. Each activity offers a progressive learning curve with puzzles from easy to challenging.

name: Pastel Pop
description: Sin descripción

name: Sips
description: A chill idle game made for GBAWinterJam2023.

name: Hamelin's Journey
description: Inspired by Pokémon, Dragon Quest, Monster Rancher and other late 90s classics, this game tasks you to explore a mysterious world, capture and train the spirits that inhabit this realm and seek the timeless creature that lurks in the depth of the underground.

name: Luggage Retrieval Officer
description: You begin your career as a Trainee, retrieving the boring bags of coach ticket holders when their luggage goes amiss. But before long you will work your way to being a highly ranked member off staff retrieving important missing luggage for the likes of the Natural History Museum, NASA and even the FBI!

name: Pseudoregalia
description: Sybil finds herself in a distorted castle and must find her own way out. Grow strong and unlock new abilities to build up a deep movement system, fight enemies, find secrets, and uncover the mysteries of Castle Sansa.

name: Million Monster Militia
description: This time, 50 giant bosses have taken over 50 cities in the United States (including recently-annexed Montreal). It's your job to cross the country, gathering troops to free the terrified population.

name: Animalia Dreamland
description: Animalia Dreamland is a small single-screen platformer for the NES. In each level you play as one of two randomly selected animals, with randomized physics. For "Three Dreams" mode you play a random three of the 17 base levels, while for "Full Game" mode you play these 17 levels, in order, followed by a final 18th level. Pressing Select on the title screen toggles "Lucid Mode", where you choose your preferred jump physics.

name: Mortal Kombat
description: The SNES version of Mortal Kombat was censored due to Nintendo's policies on violence, removing a lot of what the game was known for in the Arcades and other ports (such as the Genesis version).

name: Tales of the Rays: Mirrage Prison
description:
Mirrage Prison is the first major update for Tales of the Rays and start of a new story scenario.

This update added the scenario change option to the world map, so players who hadn't completed the first story arc could start the second right away. It also added Mirror Equipment, Mirrage Artes and the Tower of Eternal Origins.

The main character from the first story arc is swapped when playing through the new story missions, Ix to Kocis, keeping his levels and equipment but having separate outfits.

name: EX: Extra
description: A vertical doujin shmup inspired by Ketsui.

name: Don't Get Fired!
description: "Don't Get Fired!" is a survival game where you get to play a character who has no money, no connections whatsoever. You need to make him climb up the company ladder from an 'intern' to the 'president'

name: One Piece Card Game Tutorial
description:
One Piece Card Game is a collectible card game themed on the world of One Piece!
Characters from all over the history of One Piece, including the anime, manga, and movies, are featured in the game, and there are even cards inspired by famous scenes from all of them!

name: Antbuster
description: Antbuster is a game that aims to protect your delicious cake on a picnic. The cake has 8 pieces and the ants will do everything to reach them. Fortunately, you can spread cannons through the garden, and each cannon can be evolved in several different ways. There are over 50 different types of cannons to crush these insects. Can you protect the picnic?

name: The Classroom
description: In The Classroom, the player controls a high school student called Alex who is in his last ten days of school and has to take an exam on each of those days. However, Alex does not study and would rather risk cheating to perform well in his exams. In each of the ten levels in the game, the player must fill their cheat meter completely by moving next to smart students (who are represented by yellow circles) and holding the left mouse button.

name: Codename: Kids Next Door - Operation: Graduates
description: Operation: Graduates is the game is based on the Codename: Kids Next Door episode of the same name.

name: Chucky: Wanna Play?
description: Chucky: Wanna Play? is a stealth-action video game, based on the Child's Play franchise.

name: Exmortis 3
description: It starts after the events of Exmortis 2. The Earth Realm has lost all hope, as Vlaew remained unchallenged. But the redeemer (Joshua Hannay) returns from the Spirit Realm and seeks bloody revenge against the Ancient Vlaew. Will he succeed?

name: Exmortis 2
description: Exmortis II follows one of the last survivors, Mr. Hannay, who, following the words of an unknown entity at the resistance safe house, attempts to destroy the Cult of Exmortis once and for all.

name: The Curse of Kubel: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Quiz Thiz Italy: Gold Edition
description: Are you the new quiz master and can you beat your friends on this quiz? Answer questions about this country and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about this country while playing!

name: Quiz Thiz Germany
description: Are you the new quiz master and can you beat your friends on this quiz? Answer questions about this country and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about this country while playing!

name: Space Trump
description: Trump is on a new quest! To explore Space! Help him navigate this vast new real estate and see how far he can spread the American Flag!!

name: eFootball Champion Squads
description: Introducing the most famous footballers from around the world, now with photo-realistic likeness! Play at your own pace with auto matchplay and high-quality 3D graphics! Use the best players and tactics to take on world-class opponents on the pitch!

name: Two Touch: Switch
description: Two Touch: Switch is a new type of 3 match game.

name: ZokaDice
description: ZokaDice is the game of luck and strategy. Game play is simple and familiar as offered by games like Yahtzee. Let the dice roll in this exciting game of chance and strategy. Challenge friends or meet new people from all over the world, while enjoying this great, familiar game.

name: Mini Golf Space
description: Enjoy 50 challenging holes of mini golf set in space. With obstacles such as anti gravity, portals, robots and lasers, you'll have plenty of fun trying to get the best score.

name: Four: The Space Fight
description: Face-to-face multi-player fun or the challenge of a single-player career mode. A carefully crafted space shooter, that stands out of others in the genre with a different approach, fast paced gameplay, and unique design.

name: Can Your Lemon
description: 'Can Your Lemon?' is a cute simulation game where your lemon is waiting for you!

name: Race Horses Champions 3
